thread.title: Charlotte voters will choose mayor, council
thread.title_full: Charlotte voters will choose mayor, council - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Charlotte voters will choose mayor, council
text: Charlotte voters go to the polls Tuesday to elect their fifth mayor in three years as well as a new City Council. Democrat Jennifer Roberts and Republican Edwin Peacock are battling for mayor. Four Democrats – Julie Eiselt, Claire Fallon, Vi Lyles and James Mitchell – face Republicans Pablo Carvajal, John Powell and David Rice for four at-large council seats. There also are races in Districts 2, 3, 4 and 7. Mecklenburg County voters also will elect three at-large members of the school board. And voters will decide in a referendum whether to extend the terms of county commissioners from two to four years. Jim Morrill
